api_contracts.description: Returns a simple Hello World greeting message

component_logic.responsibility: Handles GET /hello requests and returns Hello World response with timestamp

interfaces.description: Returns Hello World response with current timestamp
Formats response with message, status, and timestamp

component_logic.implementation_notes: Return exactly 'Hello World' as message. Include 'success' status and current UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.fffffZ). Use datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + 'Z' for timestamp generation. No input validation needed since no parameters. Handle any exceptions and return 500 error.

component_logic.responsibility: Defines the FastAPI route configuration for the /hello endpoint

interfaces.description: Registers the /hello GET route with the FastAPI application

component_logic.implementation_notes: Use FastAPI @app.get('/hello') decorator. Set response_model to match response schema. Include summary='Get Hello World message' and description='Returns a simple Hello World greeting with timestamp'. Wire to HelloWorldHandler.get_hello() method. Set status_code=200 explicitly.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify proper separation of concerns between handler and router
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HelloWorldRouter must only handle route registration. HelloWorldHandler must contain business logic. No business logic in router component.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify response format matches API contract exactly
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Response must contain exactly three fields: message ('Hello World'), status ('success'), timestamp (ISO 8601). No additional or missing fields.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify proper exception handling for internal errors
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HelloWorldHandler must catch any exceptions and return 500 status with proper error format. No unhandled exceptions should propagate.
Use datetime.utcnow().isoformat() for timestamp generation. No complex date formatting or timezone conversions needed.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify FastAPI route configuration follows best practices
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Route must use @app.get decorator with explicit path '/hello'. Include response_model, summary, and description. Set status_code=200 explicitly.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify timestamp format is valid ISO 8601
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Timestamp must be UTC timezone with 'Z' suffix. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.fffffZ. Use datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + 'Z'.

architecture_overview: Simple 2-tier architecture with FastAPI framework. HelloWorldRouter handles HTTP routing and request/response mapping. HelloWorldHandler contains business logic for generating Hello World response with timestamp. No database or external dependencies required. Stateless design with no persistence layer.
assumptions: No authentication or authorization required for /hello endpoint
Response format includes timestamp for demonstration of dynamic content
UTC timezone is acceptable for timestamp (no user timezone handling)
No rate limiting required for simple Hello World endpoint
FastAPI automatic JSON serialization handles response formatting
No logging required beyond FastAPI default request logging
